html: (2 Nephi 24:24)."Surely as I have thought, so shall it come to pass." As the Lord has "thought" (resolved) so shall it be. He does not change His mind. He is consistent and sure! One may, with full confidence, rely upon every word of the Lord, for "he never doth vary from that which he hath said." (Mosiah 2:22.) "His purposes fail not, neither are there any who can stay his hand." (D&C 76:3.)
